text:
Ranveer (like always) made a surprise entry with Anil Kapoor and Janhvi Kapoor and together, they started dancing and having fun-converting a usual ramp walk into an entertaining live show.
From penning down her innermost feelings full of gratitude to wishing a sweet forever, this note is a heartwarming proof of the fact that their relationship is rock-solid and something that will definitely stand the test of time and remain forever.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
She said, “When I did season four, I had no idea I will be brought back. It was just one season deal. This offer came as a surprise to me. Who would have thought? I had never thought I would go back on the show as that character again."
Just to jog your memory a little, Kareena's item song Fevicol went on to become a hit and to make sure the audience is impressed again, the makers have locked her for the third installment too.
The reports of the third installment has been doing rounds since two years and now that all the actors are available, the film might surely get officially announced very soon.
title: Riteish-Genelia's 7th Anniversary, Ranveer-Anil Kapoor's 'Jhakaas' Reunion And More From Ent
description: Genelia's Wishes For Best Friend And Husband Riteish On Their 7th Anniversary Is All About Love! From penning down her innermost feelings full of gratitude to wishing a sweet forever, this note is a heartwarming proof of the fact that their relationship is rock-solid and something that will definitely stand the test of time and remain forever.
